name: Jason Robert PAUL and Joan Paul v. DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES OF THE COMMONWEALTH; Somerset County Child Protective Services; Executive Branch of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania; Office of Attorney General; and Somerset Borough Police Department. Petition of: Jason Robert Paul

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 1st day of November, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM
